duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a range of legal support and administration to the M&A and Corporate teams.
Manage General Corporate Housekeeping matters including entity formation and dissolution; obtaining EINS, and registering entities in respective states for income tax purposes.
Coordinate Due Diligence Checklists and Disclosure Schedules, draft requests and track responses.
Create organizational documents, including articles of incorporation or dissolution, stock certificates and purchase agreements.
Draft, file, register and manage various new business entity documents for corporations, LLCs and partnerships with state and federal agencies.
Assist with questions from business units regarding various legal entities, structure, etc.
Facilitate completion of commercial contracts in compliance with corporate templates and legal best practices, ensure appropriate contract authorization.
Drafting legal contracts, correspondence, and other documents.
Organizing and maintaining documents in a paper or electronic filing system.

education_certification.credential: Certificate of completion from an ABA-approved paralegal certification program of education and training, or an associate degree in paralegal studies.
